summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Land Use and Zoning; approving preliminary plans for a residential planned unit development of certain property in a Multiple Residence Low Density (RM 800) zone, a tract bounded by N.E. 75th St., N.E. 77th St., 37th Ave. N.E. and 39th Ave. N.E. (Petition of International Land Corporation, C.F. 287125,) contingent upon the recording of a properly executed, delivered and accepted Property Use and Development Agreement, and amending plat 7W, Page 46of the official Zoning Map of the City of Seattle (Ordinance 86300).
